title: Redragon K617 Fizz 60% Wired RGB Gaming Keyboard, 61 Keys Compact Mechanical Keyboard w/White and Grey Color Keycaps, Linear Red Switch, Pro Driver/Software Supported

The keycaps come in a sleek combination of White and Grey, providing a clean and sophisticated look. The Linear Red switch type offers a smooth and quiet typing experience, perfect for those who prefer a more subtle keyboard sound.

One of the standout features of this keyboard is its hot-swappable switches, allowing you to easily customize and replace the switches without any hassle. The switches have a lifespan of 50 million keypresses, ensuring long-lasting durability.
